title: 2015년 Justin Dominique Holmes v. State of Mississippi 사건
summary: 미국 Mississippi, MS 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Justin Dominique Holmes v. State of Mississippi. 판결일: 2015-12-15. 법원: Court of Appeals of Mississippi.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Justin Dominique HOLMES A/K/A Justin Domonique Holmes A/K/A Justin Holmes A/K/A Justin D. Holmes, Appellant v. STATE of Mississippi, Appellee
**판결일**: 2015-12-15
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Mississippi
**관할**: Mississippi, MS

**판사**: Barnes, Carlton, Fair, Griffis, Irving, Ishee, James, Lee, Maxwell, Wilson

## 변호인

Christopher Brian Fisher, Michael W. Crosby, Gulfport, attorneys for appellant., Office of the Attorney General by Scott Stuart, attorney for appellee.

## 인용

- 201 So. 3d 491

## 판결문 요약

        IN THE COURT OF APPEALS OF THE STATE OF MISSISSIPPI

                             NO. 2013-KA-00113-COA

JUSTIN DOMINIQUE HOLMES A/K/A JUSTIN                                  APPELLANT
DOMONIQUE HOLMES A/K/A JUSTIN
HOLMES A/K/A JUSTIN D. HOLMES

v.

STATE OF MISSISSIPPI                                                    APPELLEE


DATE OF JUDGMENT:                       11/08/2012
TRIAL JUDGE:                            HON. JOHN C. GARGIULO
COURT FROM WHICH APPEALED:              HARRISON COUNTY CIRCUIT COURT
ATTORNEYS FOR APPELLANT:                CHRISTOPHER BRIAN FISHER
                                        MICHAEL W. CROSBY
ATTORNEY FOR APPELLEE:                  OFFICE OF THE ATTORNEY GENERAL
                                        BY: SCOTT STUART
DISTRICT ATTORNEY:                      JOEL SMITH
NATURE OF THE CASE:                     CRIMINAL - FELONY
TRIAL COURT DISPOSITION:                CONVICTED OF COUNT I,
                                        MANSLAUGHTER, AND COUNT II,
                                        ATTEMPTED AGGRAVATED ASSAULT,
                                        AND SENTENCED TO TWENTY YEARS
                                        FOR EACH COUNT, WITH THE
                                        SENTENCES TO RUN CONCURRENTLY,
                                        IN THE CUSTODY OF THE MISSISSIPPI
                                        DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS
DISPOSITION:                            AFFIRMED - 12/15/2015
MOTION F...
